## Description {#details}

Helper class to hold a reply for <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/valuetracker">ValueTracker</a> queries.

Contains the returned sources for a given search and the instructions where the sources were tracked from.

Definition at line 626 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/peepholeoptimizer-cpp">PeepholeOptimizer.cpp</a>.
